message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable asset that I believe could be of great benefit to your business. I'm confident this product is worth significantly more than $1500000, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $1750000.  This is a limited-time offer, as I have another buyer lined up. I'm confident that this price point represents a substantial value proposition for you.  Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss the details further.
